txt.en: Used levers to open the gate ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the chieftain and his fell spirit companion
Naeglanc has sent you to uncover what is happening in the depths of Plas-maru.
You have defeated Mostun, now free Lhucu
'Untie me, Duvodiad, and I shall lead you out of this place.'
Seek out the main chamber of Plas-maru.
Travel deep into Plas-maru and locate the levers that control the gate to the main chamber.
Enter the main chamber of Plas-maru and uncover the secret of the cairn.
Drive back the fell spirit from Lhucu.
Speak with Lhucu and escape Plas-maru.
Enter Plas-maru and seek out the main chamber

Discover what is causing the wights to stir within the Bonevales
